title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A classic novel exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream in 1920s America.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel about manners, upbringing, morality, and marriage in early 19th century England.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing the magical world and young wizard Harry Potter.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A profound novel addressing racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy adventure following Bilbo Baggins as he embarks on a quest to win a share of treasure guarded by a dragon.
